title: Mermaid to PNG Extension
description: Settings for Mermaid diagram PNG export

targetDPI.title: Target DPI
targetDPI.description: Resolution for exported PNG images (dots per inch). Higher values produce larger, higher-quality images suitable for printing. Standard values: 96 (screen), 150 (draft print), 300 (standard print), 600 (high-quality print), 1200 (professional print).
